001package ca.gc.cra.radar.api;
002
003/**
004 * Standard exit codes for RADAR command-line entry points.
005 *
006 * @since RADAR 0.2
007 */
008public enum ExitCode {
009  SUCCESS(0),
010  INVALID_ARGS(2),
011  IO_ERROR(3),
012  CONFIG_ERROR(4),
013  RUNTIME_FAILURE(5),
014  INTERRUPTED(130);
015
016  private final int code;
017
018  ExitCode(int code) {
019    this.code = code;
020  }
021
022  /**
023   * Returns the numeric value encoded by this exit code.
024   *
025   * @return numeric exit code
026   */
027  public int code() {
028    return code;
029  }
030}
